title: Happy Birthday Nephew Tommy!  Fool #1 makes it to the Kiss Cam.  Royal Wedding is tomorrow.  Mrs. Harvey has a social media story.  The Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Happy Birthday Nephew Tommy!  Fool #1 makes it to the Kiss Cam.  Royal Wedding is tomorrow.  Mrs. Harvey has a social media story.  The Closing Remarks and more.
description:
The Nephew celebrates his birthday today. He and his wife make the Kiss Cam during a Rocket's game. Meghan Markle is soon to be wed and we still do not know who will give her away. Mrs. Harvey went to Memphis for Mother's Day and social media was talking. Today's Closing Remarks covers the importance of a support system and more! Have a great weekend!!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
